alert.note: Alert for Bastrop; Caldwell; Hays; Travis (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 18 at 8:27AM CST until December 18 at 9:15AM CST by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Caldwell County in south central Texas... Southeastern Hays County in south central Texas... Southeastern Travis County in south central Texas... Southwestern Bastrop County in south central Texas... * Until 915 AM CST. * At 826 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Uhland, or near Kyle, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... San Marcos, Kyle, Buda, Lockhart, Martindale, Uhland, Mustang Ridge, Niederwald, Cedar Creek, Wyldwood, Mountain City, Creedmoor, Rockne, Watterson, Maha, Maxwell, Reedville, Red Rock, Lytton Springs and San Marcos Regional Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
